name: Celebrity dress up - Avril Lavigne edition
name_original: Celebrity dress up - Avril Lavigne edition
description: Dress up Avril Lavigne for the next music  video. It always fun to make a mess around on the party as Avril singing here, especially if you are crazy enough to fall in love and don't care about anything. Anyway dressup for Avril Lavigne is always fun. So, be cool.
